name: Change the font size of Firefox's inspect text.
description:
This will change the font size for the text in the inspect developer tool area.

Please ensure you choose the correct font size and Firefox version.

user.name: Suraj Patel
user.about:
Note that all of my userstyles are created on, and intended for, Mozilla Firefox. If one of my userstyles breaks on this web browser, then feel free to send me a message and I will take a look.

Please rate my userstyles - whether you liked it or not! - and leave discussions if you feel like there is anything (relevant) you need to say.
